text: Jos Bernard (26 April 1924 – 26 January 2020) was a Luxembourgian gymnast who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born in Cologne in April 1924 and died in January 2020 at the age of 95.Trauer um Jos Bernard ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Luxembourgian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Luxembourg Category:Sportspeople from Cologne
title: Jos Bernard
